label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • This version is focused on changing howassist goldandbuybackformulas work

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Buyback cost changed from 100 + (Level × Level × 1.5) + (Time × 0.25) to 100 + NetWorth ÷ 13

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Buyback no longer reduces gold earned after respawning

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• AoE gold for the losing team no longer scales with the overall team net worth difference, just the individual net worth of the dying hero
    • Previously, a core on your team doing really well meant that a support on your team dying gave an increasing amount of gold to the enemy

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• The comeback component is now just: (DyingHeroNetWorth × 0.026 + 70) ÷ # of killers
    • This takes the place of the components below that considers net worth
    • For example in the 1 killer case, it replaces (NetWorthEarlyFactor × 90 + NetWorthFactor × 0.03375)
    • Like the previous formula, it is only given to the losing team

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • The gold multiplier based on the dying hero's net worth rank changed from 1.2/1.1/1/0.9/0.8 to 1.2/1.05/0.9/0.75/0.6
